patterns.title: Design DNA Auto-Injection for Consistency
patterns.context: Frontend/Mobile projects with design-reviewer in team
patterns.strategy: Auto-load OBDN + universal-taste.json into specialist context via hook. Hook detects design-heavy request (UI keywords), auto-injects OBDN reference system, specialists generate with taste constraints, visual-reviewer-v2 validates against OBDN.
patterns.evidence: CLAIMED: 80-90% first-iteration acceptance (vs 30-40% without), reduces iteration cycles by 60-70% (commit 1a9992a). NEEDS VALIDATION via A/B testing across 10 design-heavy /orca sessions.
patterns.validation_claim: 80-90% acceptance rate requires A/B testing proof
